name: 李美慧
objective:
本課程為每學期建築設計輔助配套課程，目的在協助同學加強必要的設計能力與技巧，並提升專業設計能力。同學也因此得以藉此課程加強自身的建築表現能力，例如表達、繪圖與獲得更進一步的構築知識。
As a parts and accessories to Architectural Design course, the goal of this seminar is to help students enhance their design proficiency superior to the excellent skill level of design. A student who completes this course will be able to perform a good presentation works such as oral, drawing, construction processing, etc. And will have better understanding in design presentation.
